PRODUCTS

This is the story of a rat called Al Kane, who lives in New York's sewers in the 40s. During the underworlds prohibition of sugar commercialization he built an empire out of trafficking, creating a very powerful mafia system. But after the mysterious death of his right-hand man, he was betrayed, beaten up and left for dead by the hands of a cockroach gang. Now he is back to figure out what happened and who betrayed him. He will try to recover his empire, each area at a time, exploring a sewer system that is connected by complex pathways. He also has to free his partners who controlled each of the sugar distribution points. Immersed in a sea of intrigue, where animals and insects live and work both together and against each other, he doesn't know who to trust. The only thing he knows is where everything begins: in Madam Laura's Cabaret...

Animation

A web série animada 2D se subdvide em 4 temporadas, apresentando em detalhes as histórias do universo mafioso de Al Kane, na década de 40, em Nova York.

The Board Game

The Rotfather possui 03 jogos de cartas. Um dos jogos aborda o processo de intriga entre os clãs, o outro oferece a possibilidade de criação de artimanhas relacionadas ao contrabando de objetos, e o terceiro coloca o jogador em situações de ostentação.

The Comics

Os quadrinhos trazem, de forma independente, a história de cada um dos personagens que habitam os esgotos de Nova York. O primeiro quadrinho apresenta o universo do Sapo Oyabun, que sai de sua terra natal Toquio, após o assassinato de seu dono, para ir a América estruturar uma célula da mafia japoneza nos rios que se ligam aos esgotos de Kane.

Licensed Products

The Rotfather possui vários produtos licenciados, bonecos, canecas, camisetas, bottons, chaveiros, dentre outros em desenvolvimento
